Replying to @joulsounet 2019-07-08 12:16
@Joulse_ @Netlify When you deploy your functions, they are available at URLs relative to your site domain, so by adding a custom domain, you can have whatever URLs you like. Pro tip: you can have even further control over the paths to your functions via the redirects API. https://t.co/eBnXGO7Uvo
